snippet: Friday night was the 10th anniversary of Alber Elbaz’s role as the designer of Lanvin, a period during which he has transformed the label from a dusty whatsit to an in-the-know commodity.
abstract: Friday night was the 10th anniversary of Alber Elbaz’s role as the designer of Lanvin, a period during which he has transformed the label from a dusty whatsit to an in-the-know commodity.

headline.main: At Lanvin, the Delights Come Before the Party
